name: textanalytics-botframework-middleware
description: A Node module to facilitate the usage of the textanalytics Node module under the Microsoft Bot Framework.
author: Jackson Adler <jadler@contactsolutions.com>

scripts.deploy-prod: npm run local-test && npm run version-patch && npm run push-tags
scripts.test: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
